verses.text: At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, they shall bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, out of their \w graves|strong="H6913"\w*:

And they shall \w spread|strong="H7849"\w* them before the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, and the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*, and all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, whom they have \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*, and whom they have \w served|strong="H5647"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* whom they have \w walked|strong="H1980"\w*, and whom they have \w sought|strong="H1875"\w*, and whom they have \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w*: they shall not be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w*, nor be \w buried|strong="H6912"\w*; they shall be for \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*.

And \w death|strong="H4194"\w* shall be \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* rather than \w life|strong="H2416"\w* by all the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of them that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* of this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, which \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* in all the \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whither I have \w driven|strong="H5080"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

¶ Moreover thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Shall they \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, and not \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*? shall he turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w*, and not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*?

Why \add then\add* is this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* slidden \w back|strong="H7725"\w* by a \w perpetual|strong="H5329"\w* \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w*? they \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* fast \w deceit|strong="H8649"\w*, they \w refuse|strong="H3985"\w* to \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

I \w hearkened|strong="H7181"\w* and \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, \add but\add* they spake not \w aright|strong="H1696"\w*: no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* him \w of|strong="H5921"\w* his \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? every one \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w course|strong="H4794"\w*, as the \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w rusheth|strong="H7857"\w* into the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Yea, the \w stork|strong="H2624"\w* in the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* her appointed \w times|strong="H4150"\w*; and the \w turtle|strong="H8449"\w* and the \w crane|strong="H5483"\w* and the \w swallow|strong="H5693"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w coming|strong="H0935"\w*; but my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

How do ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, We \add are\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, and the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with us? Lo, \w certainly|strong="H0403"\w* in \w vain|strong="H8267"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* he \add it;\add* the \w pen|strong="H5842"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="H5608"\w* \add is\add* in \w vain|strong="H8267"\w*.\f + \fr 8.8 \ft in vain made…: or, the false pen of the scribes worketh for falsehood\f*

The \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \add men\add* are \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w*, they are \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* and \w taken|strong="H3920"\w*: lo, they have \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and what \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \add is\add* in them?\f + \fr 8.9 \ft The wise…: or, Have they been ashamed, etc\f*\f + \fr 8.9 \ft what…: Heb. the wisdom of what thing\f*

Therefore will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* unto \w others|strong="H0312"\w*, \add and\add* their \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* to them that shall \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \add them:\add* for every one from the \w least|strong="H6996"\w* even unto the \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* is \w given|strong="H1214"\w* to \w covetousness|strong="H1215"\w*, from the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* even unto the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* every one \w dealeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w*.

For they have \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* the \w hurt|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w slightly|strong="H7043"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; when \add there is\add* no \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

Were they \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w* when they had \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w*? nay, they were not at \w all|strong="H0954"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, neither \w could|strong="H3045"\w* they \w blush|strong="H3637"\w*: therefore shall they \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* among them that \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of their \w visitation|strong="H6486"\w* they shall be cast \w down|strong="H3782"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft I will…: or, In gathering I will consume\f*

¶ I will \w surely|strong="H0622"\w* \w consume|strong="H5486"\w* them, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add there shall be\add* no \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w* on the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, nor \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* on the fig \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, and the \w leaf|strong="H5929"\w* shall \w fade|strong="H5034"\w*; and \add the things that\add* I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them shall pass \w away|strong="H5674"\w* from them.

Why do we sit \w still|strong="H3427"\w*? \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* yourselves, and let us \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w defenced|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and let us be \w silent|strong="H1826"\w* there: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath put us to \w silence|strong="H1826"\w*, and given us \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w gall|strong="H7219"\w* to \w drink|strong="H8248"\w*, because we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 8.14  t gall: or, poison *

We \w looked|strong="H6960"\w* for \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, but no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \add came; and\add* for a \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w health|strong="H4832"\w*, and behold \w trouble|strong="H1205"\w*!

The \w snorting|strong="H5170"\w* of his \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* from \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*: the whole \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w trembled|strong="H7493"\w* at the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w neighing|strong="H4684"\w* of his strong \w ones|strong="H0047"\w*; for they are \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and have \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w all|strong="H4393"\w* that is in it; the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and those that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein.\f + \fr 8.16 \ft all…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

For, behold, I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w serpents|strong="H5175"\w*, \w cockatrices|strong="H6848"\w*, among you, which \add will\add* not \add be\add* \w charmed|strong="H3908"\w*, and they shall \w bite|strong="H5391"\w* you, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ \add When\add* I would \w comfort|strong="H4010"\w* myself against \w sorrow|strong="H3015"\w*, my \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add is\add* \w faint|strong="H1742"\w* in me.\f + \fr 8.18 \ft in: Heb. upon\f*

Behold the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* because of them that dwell in a \w far|strong="H4801"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: \add Is\add* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*? \add is\add* not her \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in her? Why have they provoked me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w* with their graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w*, \add and\add* with \w strange|strong="H5236"\w* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*?\f + \fr 8.19 \ft them…: Heb. the country of them that are far off\f*
The \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* is \w past|strong="H5674"\w*, the \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* is \w ended|strong="H3615"\w*, and we are not \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*.

For the \w hurt|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* am I \w hurt|strong="H7665"\w*; I am \w black|strong="H6937"\w*; \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w* hath taken \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on me.

\add Is there\add* no \w balm|strong="H6875"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*; \add is there\add* no \w physician|strong="H7495"\w* there? why \w then|strong="H3588"\w* is not the \w health|strong="H0724"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w recovered|strong="H5927"\w*?\f + \fr 8.22 \ft recovered: Heb. gone up?\f*
